Name: Pleiades
Functional Text:
**Instant** - {t}, remove a suspense counter from an aura you control: You may put a suspense counter on an aura of suspense you control.

Whenever the crowd cheers you, create a Confidence token.

Name: Moment Maker
Functional Text:
**Once per Turn Action** - {r}{r}{r}: **Attack**

If you control 3 or more auras of suspense, this gets +2{p} and "When this hits a hero, **the crowd cheers** you."

Name: Tiara of Suspense
Functional Text:
**Instant** - Destroy this: Put a suspense counter on an aura of suspense you control. Activate this only if you've been cheered this turn.

**Guardwell**

Name: Virtuoso Bodice
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may remove a suspense counter from an aura you control. If you do, gain {r}{r}.

**Blade Break**

Name: Attention Grabbers
Functional Text:
When this defends, you may remove a suspense counter from an aura you control. If you do, this gets +2{d} this chain link.

**Blade Break**

Name: Boots to the Boards
Functional Text:
When this defends, pay up to {r}{r}{r}. Create that many Toughness tokens.

**Temper**

Name: Boulder Drop
Functional Text: **Crush** - When this deals 4 or more damage to a hero, they put a card from their hand on top of their deck.

Name: Standing Ovation
Functional Text: If 3 or more auras of suspense have left the arena this turn, this gets "When this hits a hero, take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of the next end phase, they draw up to their {i}."

Name: Superstar
Functional Text:
**Suspense**

When this enters or leaves the arena, **the crowd cheers** you.

Name: The Suspense is Killing Me
Functional Text:
**Suspense**

Your first attack each turn gets +1{p}.

Name: To Be Continued...
Functional Text:
**Suspense**

The first time you would be dealt damage each turn, prevent 1 of that damage.

Name: What Happens Next?
Functional Text:
**Suspense**

The first card with cost 1 or more you play each turn costs {r} less to play.

Name: Confidence
Functional Text: At the start of your turn, destroy this, then the next attack card you play this turn can't be defended by more than 2 non-block cards.

Name: Toughness
Functional Text: At the start of your opponent's turn, destroy this, then the next action card you defend with this turn gets +1{d} this chain link.
